description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Les Curiositez de Paris. Par M. L. R. Réimprimées d'après l'édition originale de 1716, etc. [Variously attributed to Claude Marin Saugrain and George Louis Le Rouge, but more probably by the former. Edited by Anatole de Courde de Montaiglon.]" Contributor: COURDE DE MONTAIGLON, Anatole de. Contributor: R., M. L. Contributor: Saugrain, Claude Marin. Author: Société d'Encouragement pour la Propagation des Livres d'Art (PARIS) Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10168.m.4." Page: 335 Place of Publishing: Paris Date of Publishing: 1883 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002773771 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
